ME trains will ground load at 111th, 107th, 103rd, 95th, 91st, 87th, 83rd, 79th, and 75th Street.

ME All trains will ground load at 111th, 107th, 103rd, 95th, 91st, 87th, 83rd, 79th, and 75th Street. Please wait visible to the engineer, do not operate chains or gates in ground load areas, follow train crew's instructions after the train stops

NCS 114 Delayed Departure
NCS Train #114 scheduled to depart Antioch at 9:10 a.m., will be extensively delayed due to earlier mechanical failure. An update will be provided when this train is on the move.

NCS Train #101 Remains Stopped

NCS train #101, scheduled to arrive Antioch at 8:55 AM, remains stopped near Western Avenue due to mechanical problems. Extensive delays anticipated. Metra will provide updates as information becomes available. Updated 9:15 a.m.

The Flossmoor elevator is out of service. Customers can use Calumet as alternate boarding station. Updates will be provided.

The Van Buren Street Station elevator is out of service Customers can use the Museum Campus or McCormick Place elevator as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.

MDW Train #2205 Delayed

MDW train #2205, scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 8:55 AM, may be operating 40 to 50 minutes behind schedule due to mechanical problems involving North Central Service train #101. Visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.

Some UPW inbound trains may be operating up to 30 minutes behind schedule due to earlier freight train interference. Please visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.

MDN train #2107, scheduled to arrive Grayslake at 8:57 AM, may be operating 25 to 35 minutes behind schedule due to mechanical problems involving North Central Service train #101. Visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.

ME Train 114 will not operate
MED train #114, scheduled to depart University Park at 8:30 AM, will not operate due to mechanical problems. Train #116 will accommodate  passengers.

ME trains will board from the north end of the platform at 47th, 27th, 23rd McCormick Place and 18th Street.

All trains will board from the north end of the platform at 47th, 27th, 23rd McCormick Place and 18th Street. Please wait visible to the engineer, do not operate chains or gates in ground load areas, follow train crew's instructions after the train stops.

ME Ivanhoe Elevator Is Out Of Service
The Ivanhoe elevator is out of service.  Customers can use 147th Street/Sibley or 115th Street/Kensington as alternate boarding stations.  Updates will be provided.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Metra Electric 103rd Station Closed - Full Reconstruction

As part of the Metra Electric Community Initiative to transform 13 stations on the district, the 103rd Street/Rosemoor station remains closed for a full reconstruction and is expected to reopen next spring. During this time, customers can use 107th Street and 95th Street/Chicago State University as alternatives. For additional information click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 87th street/Woodruff Station Closure Beginning December 16 - Station Rebuild Project

The 87th street/Woodruff station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, December 16. During this time passengers can use 83rd and 91st street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, the station will have an enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrance, lobby with an elevator, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage. The station is expected to reopen in late 2025. For more information visit metra.com.
